name: Sigewinne
source: Reward for inviting Sigewinne to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Rebound Hydrotherapy
skills.descriptionraw: Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112131]</color> and insert as the third card from the top of your deck. This character gains 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color>. (After the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112131]</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112132]</color> and place in your opponent's deck. After the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112132]</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112133]</color> and place in your deck.)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Large Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and insert as the third card from the top of your deck. This character gains 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color>. (After the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Large Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place in your opponent's deck. After the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Small Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place in your deck.)
skills.description: Create 1 Large Bolstering Bubblebalm and insert as the third card from the top of your deck. This character gains 3 stacks of Bond of Life. (After the Large Bolstering Bubblebalm effect is triggered, create a Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm and place in your opponent's deck. After the Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm effect is triggered, create a Small Bolstering Bubblebalm and place in your deck.)

skills.name: Super Saturated Syringing
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, then performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Medical Intervention of Pure Intention</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Medical Intervention of Pure Intention.

skills.name: Detailed Diagnosis, Thorough Treatment
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> attached to your character is completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to this character: </color>If your side has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112101]</color>, -1 to their $[K3], and this character gains 1 $[K310].
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color> attached to your character is completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to this character: </color>If your side has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sourcewater Droplet</color>, -1 to their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>, and this character gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.
skills.description:
(Passive) When Bond of Life attached to your character is completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)
When you switch to this character: If your side has Sourcewater Droplet, -1 to their Usage(s), and this character gains 1 Energy.
